phrases: This letter came for you, from your mom.
180-3003 1-7-5 Kichijoji Minami, Higashi Musashimurano, Tokyo Sakuragi Hinako-sama
When I think of a girl like you who cannot speak becoming an actress,
So, to see you acting, I will be coming to visit you soon!
We will Have a Training Camp
Mom's coming to see me act?
I will get nervous and turn into a scarecrow for sure!
I have not even been in any real performances since the culture festival...
I will just have to let her see me working in the coffee shop
to give her peace of mind...
That would be even more embarrassing!
When I looked at the flowerbed at school today, there were some flowers that were not there yesterday.
I wondered if someone had planted them.
I wonder if it looked like this.
The next time I have a sketch assignment in class, I think I will sketch some flowers from the flowerbed.
I wonder if there will be different flowers then.
I hope there are sunflowers in the summer.
The Yokonyans Are Rooting for You!
Yokomichi Street Shopping District Restoration Association
There is going to be a stamp rally event in the shopping district soon.
Customers visit all the participating stores in turn
I would like a stamp, please!
and get a card stamped at each store.
Then at the end, prizes are awarded.
And our shop is going to be participating this year.
what can we do to bring in lots of customers?
I-In that case, why do not we do a performance?
I have been wanting the Hitotose Troupe to have its first performance!
And it would give my mom a chance to see me acting, too!
Hina-chan, you have been thinking of our troupe that much?
If that is what you are planning, I will write a script for us.
And I will help with the props and wardrobe.
Mayu-chan, you should be in the play, too.
I do not like being in the spotlight,
But you did so well at the culture festival...
Th-That was out of desperation to help Hina-chan!
I thought you would be perfect for an angel or child role.
Then how about a doll role?
What kind of play should it be?
I think it should be one both adults and children can enjoy.
How about an adventure story, then?
The main character is a treasure hunter who is traveling the world.
That is an awfully large scale...
and enemies try to kill her...
You want to blow up the shop?!
Let us play it safe and do our take on a fairy tale.
She is being all friendly with Chiaki-senpai again!
But the park will be really crowded on the weekend.
Then why do not we practice in my room?
There is not much furniture, so it is roomy.
Yeah, your room is always so tidy.
And you have lots of stuffed animals in yours.
After coming to Tokyo, I got into the habit of collecting stuffed animals...
I want to talk about that stuff, too!
Merchandise for the new mascot comes out today!
Some of it is seasonal exclusives, so I will have to go straight over after school.
It is only available during this season, after all!
You should have told me sooner.
I am a member of the troupe, you know!
We actually just decided to do it yesterday.
Cannot we practice in the school's empty classroom?
If we say it is for a theater assignment, we can get permission.
You think it will be that easy?
The teachers trust me a lot!
You really do have your act together!
Well, it is more like my stock naturally went up as I kept covering for Hinako...
I have been curious about the cake shop that opened in front of the station, so I will buy a cake from there.
I think I will buy a cake for Mom, too!
I wonder what kind of cake she likes...
I worked really hard today, so my mom gave me an allowance!
The cast will be you, me, Kuina, and Chiaki-senpai,
and Mayu-senpai is making the props and wardrobe, right?
Maybe I will take care of the makeup.
And the landlady's going to make flyers.
She likes to draw, she says.
Then maybe she will do our backdrops and scenery, too.
And I will also take care of picking a venue for our after-party.
We want a restaurant with good, cheap food, right?
Do you guys prefer Japanese or Western food?
You should put more effort into writing the script than picking a restaurant...
I-I think I would like to play a tree or a statue.
That way, if I turn into a scarecrow, Mom will not notice.
we would like to borrow the empty classroom after school.
This is not for the theater club?
I know it is safe to let you use it, Nakajima-san.
It really was easy to get permission!
It sounds like you are planning something interesting.
I did not know you had a desk in the faculty office, Ruri-chan.
Well, despite my appearance, I am a club advisor.
Anyway, what is it you are planning to do?
Oh, actually, we will be putting on a theater performance at Hitotose.
So that is why you will be practicing.
I cannot just sit idly by knowing you are practicing theater.
Would it be all right if I joined you?
it is just part of my job.
let us hold a training camp here at school this weekend!
Um, Sensei, a training camp on such short notice?
I guess you like that sort of event, huh, Ruri-chan?
Packing my things took longer than I expected!
Wow, you brought a pretty big bag.
Well, I brought lots of things.
Kuu-chan and Mayu-chan, you have big bags, too.
You brought all these as references to write a script?
Sh-She plans to eat them all...
I brought my favorite stuffed animal!
This is going to be fun!
This is shaping up to be just a slumber party...
Jeez, you guys are too hyped up for just an overnight training camp.
All you need is the bare minimum: face wash, toner, moisturizer, and aroma oils.
I would say those are the things we will need the least.
What do you think is most important to bring, then?
Questions like that are common, huh?
Like, what would you take to a deserted island?
I would take a field guide of edible plants.
It is both useful and edible!
It will not be useful anymore if you eat it!
I would take a water filter.
Maybe food for all the animals that would come to see me?
Worry about getting food for yourself!
This classroom is where we will be training all night!
I laid out the futons while I waited.
My parents told me the best part of a training camp is the pillow fight.
This really is shaping up to be just a slumber party...
I will make dinner while you are all practicing.
She is not an actress in the Hitotose Troupe?
Oh... no, she gets embarrassed easily,
so she does not want to be on the stage.
Maybe I will change into a maid outfit later...
She is such a cute girl.
She is a very good dancer, too.
In that case, why do not we debut her as an idol?
Are you having a good time?
I think she would be even more embarrassed to do that.
Time to polish my acting skills so I can impress Mom!
Hina-chan seems even more driven than usual.
Miss Landlady, is the shopping district event very large in scale?
No, it is not that large.
But the shop that draws the most customers will receive a bale of rice.
You really love to eat, huh, Hina-chan?
Oh, no, I fully understand where you are coming from!
Well, shall we end our practice for now?
Since it is a training camp, I got a bit overzealous.
You two are pathetic, passing out from that!
You are still very energetic, Yua-chan.
Um, I-I can still keep going...
I am going to go wash my face!
I-It is kind of creepy in here...
F-Feels almost like a ghost might pop out...
I will wash up fast and hurry back.
This month's goal: Only 1 cake per day!
Work: Tues: Thurs: Sat: Buy the ticket by next Thursday!
In order to continue things you do not like doing, it is important to do what you can every day.
Mayu-chan, your vegetable curry is so good!
What is your favorite food, Hina-chan?
The ones we could pick back home were the best, though!
Fresh-picked is always better, is not it?
I like shortcake and Hamburg steaks.
I like nanbu senbei, salt-grilled saury...
Most of the foods I like are the things that you like the least, huh?
You two really are opposite extremes...
The school is kind of creepy at night, is not it?
By the way, have you heard of this school's seven mysteries?
Your school did not have anything like that, Hina-chan?
I think there was a walking Ninomiya Kinjirou,
a Ninomiya Kinjirou that suddenly grew heavy,
I do not want them to think I, Yua-sama, was scared by a ghost!
the Ninomiya Kinjirou in the mirror,
I am not leaving this classroom again for the rest of the night!
a stain on the wall that was Ninomiya Kinjirou,
a Ninomiya Kinjirou with shining eyes, and...
Hina-chan, could you go get a washrag from the home ec classroom?
I just said that out of habit!
Okay, you can both go together.
Um, the home ec room is this way, right?
Ah, so that is why Mayu-chan gave me this.
I knew I should not have left the classroom...
I am so scared, I feel like I will pass out!
Yua-chan, do you not like dark places?
That is not... not... not true...
But you always help me out,
so I thought I should be there for you this time.
I guess I will hold your hand.
Well, this is still a lot brighter than the countryside at night.
I guess it wandered in here and got lost.
I wish we could stay over at school every weekend.
After spending the day with all of you,
I have got some ideas for my script!
It is a horror story, though...
Everyone is having fun, and all is well.
I guess this kind of training camp could be nice once in a while.
When do we get to have the pillow fight?
You are really stuck on that, huh, Sensei?
I mean, it is fine if you are not.
It was really reassuring having you ther
The training camp was so much fun.
Last night was awful for me, though.
I cannot sleep without that mask on...
I-It is not like I was scared or anything!
Kuu-chan, are you writing the script?
I think it will be done by the end of this week!
It is not a horror story.
I am not scared of that stuff, okay?!
The script and our practices are coming along well.
I think I can be confident on the stage!
I will make sure Mom sees me at my best!
I cannot wait until the day of the event.
Let us make the Hitotose Troupe's first performance a success!
Hina-chan, is a bale of rice that appealing to you?
Kuu-chan finally finished the script for the Hitotose Troupe's first performance!
Which means it is my time to shine!
Everyone, try on these costumes right away!
